snippet: The Vatican announced that Pope Francis had given his approval to the decision to canonize the Rev. Junipero Serra, an 18th-century missionary who brought Christianity to the American Indians along the West Coast.
abstract: Pope Francis approves canonization of Rev Junipero Serra, 18th-century missionary who brought Christianity to West Coast Native Americans.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican announced that Pope Francis had given his approval to the decision to canonize the Rev. Junipero Serra, an 18th-century missionary who brought Christianity to the American Indians along the West Coast.
